005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
019
020import java.util.List;
021
022import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
023
024public final class MapEntry {
025  @NonNull
026  public static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
027      .name("entry")
028      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
029      .deterministic()
030      .contextIndependent()
031      .focusIndependent()
032      .argument(IArgument.builder()
033          .name("key")
034          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
035          .one()
036          .build())
037      .argument(IArgument.builder()
038          .name("item")
039          .type(IItem.class)
040          .zeroOrMore()
041          .build())
042      .returnType(IItem.class)
043      .returnOne()
044      .functionHandler(MapEntry::execute)
045      .build();
046
047  private MapEntry() {
048    // disable construction
049  }
050
051  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
052  @NonNull
053  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<IMapItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
054      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
055      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
056      IItem focus) {
057    IAnyAtomicItem key = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
058    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") T value = (T) arguments.get(1).toCollectionValue();
059
060    return entry(key, value).asSequence();
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
065   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-entry">map:entry</a>.
066   *
067   * @param <T>
068   *          the type of items in the given Metapath map
069   * @param key
070   *          the Metapath map entry key
071   * @param value
072   *          the Metapath map entry value
073   * @return a new array containing the modification
074   */
075  @NonNull
076  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IMapItem<T> entry(
077      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key,
078      @NonNull T value) {
079    return IMapItem.ofEntries(IMapItem.entry(key, value));
080  }
081}
